trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked set [coin v] to [0] set [number of heads v] to [0] set [number of tails v] to [0] ask [How many times would you like to flip a coin?] and wait set [number of flips v] to (answer) repeat (number of flips) set [coin v] to (pick random (1) to (2)) if <(coin) = [1]> then change [number of heads v] by (1) else change [number of tails v] by (1) end end say (join (round (((number of heads) * (100)) / (number of flips))) [% heads]) for (3) secs say (join (round (((number of tails) * (100)) / (number of flips))) [% tail]) for (3) secs
